description:
Directory - Connect with virtually anyone on campus: the entire student body, faculty and administration.

Athletics - Check schedules, scores and stay up-to-date with your favorite sports.

Events - Find everything happening on and around campus, from concerts to lectures and recreation.

Maps - Never get lost again. Find out exactly where you are and where you need to go.

Videos - Stream videos from recent campus speakers and events right to your phone.

News - Get the latest headlines, and browse and search recent articles to stay on top of important campus news.

Images - Search, browse, and download images from university or subscription collections.

Emergency - Provide access to important phone numbers and websites, giving all campus stakeholders peace of mind.

Library - Browse the library catalog and check item availability on-the-go.
